name: CADisplayLink
desc: A timer object that allows your application to synchronize its drawing to the refresh rate of the display.

items.name: add
items.desc: Registers the display link with a run loop.

items.name: remove
items.desc: Removes the display link from the run loop for the given mode.

items.name: invalidate
items.desc: Removes the display link from all run loop modes.

items.name: duration
items.desc: The time interval between screen refresh updates.

items.name: preferredFramesPerSecond
items.desc: The preferred frame rate for the display link callback.

items.name: frameInterval
items.desc: The number of frames that must pass before the display link notifies the target again.

items.name: isPaused
items.desc: A Boolean value that states whether the display linkâ€™s notifications to the target are suspended.

items.name: timestamp
items.desc: The time value associated with the last frame that was displayed.

items.name: targetTimestamp
items.desc: The time value associated with the next frame that was displayed.

items.name: CACurrentMediaTime
items.desc: Returns the current absolute time, in seconds.
